    @NextUpdate
 @BaseClass
public class NeighborCFExtItemBasedSoco
extends NeighborCFExtItemBased
    This class sets up item-based neighbor collaborative filtering (Neighbor CF) algorithm with soft cosine.
    Version:
    12.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
